agenda.description: SENATE NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Veteran Affairs & Border Security TIME & DATE: 1:30 PM or upon adjournment Wednesday, February 20, 2019 PLACE: 2E.20 (Betty King Cmte. Rm.) CHAIR: Senator Donna Campbell The Senate Veteran Affairs and Border Security Committee will meet to consider and adopt the Committee rules and conduct any other organizational business deemed necessary by the Chair. The Committee will only hear invited testimony from the following agencies: · Department of Public Safety · Health and Human Services Commission · Texas Military Department · Office of the Governor, Texas Military Preparedness Commission · Texas Veterans Commission · Texas Veterans Land Board
